mapper.select: select M.*, R.* from member M inner join memberRole MR on M.username = MR.username inner join role R on MR.id = R.id where M.username = #{username}
mapper.insert: insert into member(username, password, name, phone, email, birth, smsAgree, emailAgree, enabled) values(#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{smsAgree}, #{emailAgree}, #{enabled})
mapper.select: select username from member where username = #{username}
select m.username, m.email, mi.enabledMile from member m inner join mileage mi on m.username=mi.username where mi.mileNum = (select max(mileNum) from mileage where username=#{username})
